title: Junior Boys album cover font?
content:
I thought at first that this was an Emigre font but now I'm not so sure.... it reminds me of the Face during the 1980s but I don't think it's a Neville Brody font either. Any ideas, anyone?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [juniorboys.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422211313/http:/typophile.com/files/juniorboys.jpg) | 8.12 KB |
author: ngchol

comments.content: I think we bump into gotham again ... (from [WWW.TYPOGRAPHY.COM](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422211313/http:/www.typography.com/ "WWW.TYPOGRAPHY.COM"))
Excellent!! Gotham Bold, slightly spaced out?

Slightly OT: The album title reminds me of [http://ktd.club.fr/programmation/images/latexit\_128.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422211313/http:/ktd.club.fr/programmation/images/latexit_128.png).
